qas.question: What was the total worldwide energy consumption in 2012?
What is solar energy's yearly potential?
What makes solar energy an appealing source of electricity>

answers.text: The large magnitude of solar energy available

qas.question: Who estimated the annual potential of solar energy in 2000?

context: <a2_0>The large magnitude of solar energy available<a2_0/> makes it a highly appealing source of electricity. <a3_0>The United Nations Development Programme<a3_0/> in its 2000 World Energy Assessment found that the annual potential of solar energy was <a1_0>1,575–49,837 exajoules (EJ)<a1_0/>. This is several times larger than the total world energy consumption, which was <a0_0>559.8 EJ<a0_0/> in 2012.
